name: Hans Vs. The Remake
description: Hans Vs. The Remake is a Pong clone to the extreme! Play as googly-eyed hand puppets in various arcade competitions. Recreations of games like pong, volleyball, air hockey, lethal league, and a very odd pong clone that I made in high school, Hans Vs. The Russian. This remake has been made with accuracy in mind, though not necessarily quality. Have fun!
